alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 5:57PM EDT until August 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Ross County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marshall, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Bainbridge, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Lake, Rainsboro, Berrysville and Paint Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
